Traits.Name: Brute
Traits.Content:
A	melee	weapon	deals	one	extra	die	of	its	damage	
when	the	bugbear	hits	with	it	(included	in	the	attack).

Traits.Name: Surprise	Attack
Traits.Content:
. If	the	bugbear	surprises	a	creature	and	
hits	it	with	an	attack	during	the	first round	of	combat,	
the	target	takes	an	extra	7	(2d6)	damage	from	the	
attack.

Actions.Name: Morningstar
Actions.Content:
Melee	Weapon	Attack: +4	to	hit,	reach	5	
ft.,	one	target.	Hit: 11	(2d8	+	2)	piercing	damage

Actions.Name: Javelin
Actions.Content:
Melee	or	Ranged	Weapon	Attack: +4	to	hit,	
reach	5	ft.	or	range	30/120	ft.,	one	target.	Hit: 9	(2d6	+	
2)	piercing	damage	in	melee	or	5	(1d6	+	2)	piercing	
damage	at	range.
